name: Bad Santa
description: You better watch out, you better not cry, you better not pout the brewers at Pelican are telling you why: Bad Santa has arrived. This mysterious dark elixir is filled with complex malt flavors and aromas with toasted malt and roast character, blending seamlessly to the alluring herbal hop aroma that comes from copious amounts of Fuggle hops. Bad Santa doesn't care if you've been naughty or nice, he wants this beer on your list.
